item.description: Hey this is a weekly fashion show that is hosted at the liberty hotel (hot spot in Boston). There will be lots of people and drinks. This place is fun. If anyone is interested in having dinner at Clink, we could do that so let me know. Otherwise lets meet up at alibi at 900pm. My cell number is 8482280120 so if you want to text me me to find out where we are, go for it. For the most part people are dressed up for the show, although at the bar (alibi) it can go any which way
item.name: Fashionably Late Fashion Show and Drinks at Liberty Hotel
